Script.label: spd_mode
Script.script: (A:AUTOPILOT SPEED SLOT INDEX, Number) 1 == if{ 2 (>H:A320_Neo_CDU_MODE_MANAGED_SPEED) } els{ 1 (>H:A320_Neo_CDU_MODE_SELECTED_SPEED) }

Script.label: hdg_mode
Script.script: (A:AUTOPILOT HEADING SLOT INDEX, Number) 1 == if{ 2 (>H:A320_Neo_CDU_MODE_MANAGED_HEADING) } els{ 1 (>H:A320_Neo_CDU_MODE_SELECTED_HEADING) }

Script.label: appr_btn
Script.script: (L:A32NX_AUTOPILOT_APPR_MODE, Number) 1 == if{ 0 (>L:A32NX_AUTOPILOT_APPR_MODE, Number) 0 (>K:AP_LOC_HOLD_OFF)} els{0 (>L:A32NX_AUTOPILOT_LOC_MODE, Number) 1 (>K:AP_LOC_HOLD_OFF) 1 (>L:A32NX_AUTOPILOT_APPR_MODE, Number) 1 (>K:AP_APR_HOLD_ON) }

Script.label: vs_mode
Script.script: (L:A320_NE0_FCU_STATE, Number) 1 == if{ 0 (>H:A320_Neo_FCU_VS_ZERO, Number) 1 (>H:A320_Neo_FCU_VS_HOLD, Number) 1 (>K:AP_PANEL_ALTITUDE_HOLD, Number) 1 (>K:AP_PANEL_VS_ON, Number) 0 (>L:A320_NE0_FCU_STATE, Number) } els{ 0 (>H:A320_Neo_FCU_VS_HOLD, Number) 1 (>H:A320_Neo_FCU_VS_ZERO, Number) 1 (>K:AP_PANEL_VS_ON) 0 (>L:A320_NEO_FCU_FORCE_SELECTED_ALT, Number) 1 (>L:A320_NE0_FCU_STATE, Number) }

Script.label: alt_mode
Script.script: (A:AUTOPILOT ALTITUDE SLOT INDEX, Number) 1 == if{ 2 (>H:A320_Neo_CDU_MODE_MANAGED_ALTITUDE) } els{ 1 (>H:A320_Neo_CDU_MODE_SELECTED_ALTITUDE) }
